definition: of or relating to the multiplicative inverse of a quantity or function, hybridization involving a pair of crosses that reverse the sexes associated with each genotype
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the multiplicative inverse of a quantity or function
= example: of or relating to the multiplicative inverse of a quantity or function
- concerning each of two or more persons or things
= synonyms: mutual
noun
- hybridization involving a pair of crosses that reverse the sexes associated with each genotype
= synonyms: reciprocal cross
- (mathematics) one of a pair of numbers whose product is 1: the reciprocal of 2/3 is 3/2
= synonyms: multiplicative inverse
- something (a term or expression or concept) that has a reciprocal relation to something else
= example: something (a term or expression or concept) that has a reciprocal relation to something else
